tool_description: Verify whether a given number is registered on WhatsApp and determine if it belongs to WhatsApp Business. To obtain the status of a particular number, please provide the number along with the corresponding country code.
name: WhatsApp Business Number Validators
title: WhatsApp Business Number Validators

api_list.name: Validate Single Number (via GET Request)
api_list.description: Authenticate the registration status of a given number on WhatsApp, and ascertain its affiliation with WhatsApp Business. To retrieve the status of a specific number, kindly furnish the number along with the corresponding country code without "+".
